original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Gad was Eliasaph the son of Deuel.
korean_text: 갓 자손 지파의 군대는 드우엘의 아들 엘리아삽이 이끌었더라

sentences.original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Gad
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 갓 자손 지파의 군대 위에는

sentences.original_text: was Eliasaph the son of Deuel.
